Class SingleMotor

  • java.lang.Object
    • SingleMotor

  • public class SingleMotor
extends java.lang.Object
    Management of a motor in a NXT brick. In the LEGO Mindstorms environment is represented by the green block "Motor".

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static byte MAX_POWER
      Defines the maximum motor power.
      static byte MIN_POWER
      Defines the minimum motor power.
      static char PORT_A
      NXT brick motor port A.
      static char PORT_B
      NXT brick motor port B.
      static char PORT_C
      NXT brick motor port C.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Constructor method, creates the single motor with the motor port.

        public char getMotorPort()

        Returns:

      • isMotorPort

        public boolean isMotorPort(char motorPort)
        Check if the motor port passed as parameter exists on the NXT brick.
        Parameters:
        motorPort - The motor port on the NXT brick to check if exists.
        Returns:
        True if the motor port exists on the NXT brick, otherwise false.
